text: Ngenxa yoko Sayalela kuBantwana bakwaSirayeli ukuba; xa ubani ethe wabulala umntu kungengampindezelo yakubulala, (koko) ikukwandisa ubutshinga ezweni kuya kufana nokuba ubulele abantu bonke, kanti ukuba umntu uthe wasindisa ubomi (bomntu omnye) kuya kufana nokuba usindise ubomi babantu bonke. Inene kwafika kubo (aBantwana bakwaSirayeli), abaThunywa beThu, benemiqondiso ecacileyo kodwa nasemva koko abaninzi kubo bathi gqolo ukugabadela, (batsiba imida) emhlabeni
